嶮字的基本解释

嶮
xiǎn
见“崄”。

嶮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎn］
［《廣韻》虚檢切，上琰，曉。］
［《廣韻》魚檢切，上琰，疑。］
“崄1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。同“險1”。
(1)险要；险阻；危险。
(2)阴险；奸邪。参见“嶮薄”、“嶮縱”。
(3)严厉。
(4)乖僻；怪僻。
(5)险些；几乎。

嶮字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页320第31
【廣韻】【集韻】?虛檢切，音險。【說文】阻難也。　又高峻貌。【嵆康·琴賦】丹崖嶮巘，靑壁萬尋。【郭璞·江賦】壯天地之嶮介。　又【集韻】【類篇】?魚窆切，音噞。嵰嶮，山貌。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎn］
["Guangyun" false check and cut, Shangyan, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" fish inspection, Shangyan, suspicious. ]
"崄1" in traditional characters. Also called "1". Same as "risk 1".
(1) Danger; danger; danger.
(2) Sinister; treacherous. See also "being thin", "longitudinal".
(3) Stern.
(4) Perverse; eccentric.
(5) Almost; almost.

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? False inspection, sound risk. [Said the text] It's also difficult.　High and majestic appearance. 【Rongkang·Qin Fu】Danya 崄巘, Qianbi Wanxun. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] An introduction to the great world.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Fish cut, sound 噞.嵰崄, mountain appearance.
